item.title: Rmd test 01
item.description: R code test test codes of ggplot and dplyr packages. so far, they are working. library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union sum <- Orange %>% group_by(Tree) %>% summarise( age_m = mean(age), circum_m = mean(circumference), n = n() ) print(sum) ## # A tibble: 5 Ã— 4 ## Tree age_m circum_m n ## <ord> <dbl> <dbl> <int> ## 1 3 922.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
